text.__SUMMARY__: Scleria mikawana is a plant in the family Cyperaceae. It grows as a tall, slender annual sedge.
text.Description: Scleria mikawana grows up to 120 centimetres (47 in) tall. The leaves measure 3 to 7 millimetres (0.1 to 0.3 in) wide.
text.Distribution and habitat:
Scleria mikawana grows widely in tropical Africa, South Asia, Japan, China, Indochina, Malesia and Australia. Its habitat is wet grassy locales and swamps.
